name: Lizardfolk
description: Lizardfolk are bipedal humanoids with reptilian traits, including scaled skin, tails, and sharp teeth. They are pragmatic and resourceful, with even the color of their scales adapting to the the enviornment they find themselves in. Many embrace a survivalist mindset, using their keen senses and natural agility to thrive and seek the glory of bringing down prey that are many times larger in size than themselves.

options.name: Reptilian Anatomy
options.description: Lizardmen have strong scales that protect against basic Attacks and eyes that allow them to hunt at night. Gain +2 Physical Mitigation while not wearing armor and Infravision.

options.name: Action : Snapjaw
options.description: You make an Unarmed Attack and bite a Creature, doubling your Damage Bonus Modifier. A Creature hit by this Attack must make a Resilience Check greater than or equal to Half the damage after Mitigations or they gain the Bleeding Condition.

options.name: Cold-Blooded Survivor
options.description: Your reptilian physiology allows you to go long periods without food and endure harsh conditions. You only need to eat once per week and gain +1 Wildcraft.
